com.enterprisedt.net.ftp

Class FTPFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enterprisedt.net.ftp.FTPFile

  • public class FTPFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a remote file (implementation)

    $Revision: 1.20 $
    Author:
    Bruce Blackshaw
